member.name: M:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.DcClient.CreateDirectConnect(TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest)
member.summary: This API is used to apply for a connection. When calling this API, please note that: You need to complete identity verification for your account; otherwise, you cannot apply for a connection; If there is any connection in arrears under your account, you cannot apply for more connections.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.AccessPointName
member.summary: Access point name.

member.summary: Unique access point ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.State
member.summary: Access point status. Valid values: available, unavailable.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.Location
member.summary: Access point location.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.LineOperator
member.summary: List of ISPs supported by access point.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.RegionId
member.summary: ID of the region that manages the access point.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.AvailablePortType
member.summary: Available port type at the access point. Valid values: 1000BASE-T: gigabit electrical port; 1000BASE-LX: 10 km gigabit single-mode optical port; 1000BASE-ZX: 80 km gigabit single-mode optical port; 10GBASE-LR: 10 km 10-gigabit single-mode optical port; 10GBASE-ZR: 80 km 10-gigabit single-mode optical port; 10GBASE-LH: 40 km 10-gigabit single-mode optical port; 100GBASE-LR4: 10 km 100-gigabit single-mode optical portfiber optic port. Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid value is obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.Coordinate
member.summary: Latitude and longitude of the access point Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.City
member.summary: City where the access point is located Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.Area
member.summary: Access point region Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.AccessPoint.AccessPointType
member.summary: Access point type. Valid values: `VXLAN`, `QCPL`, and `QCAR`. Note: this field may return `null`, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.DirectConnectName
member.summary: Connection name.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.AccessPointId
member.summary: Access point of connection. You can call `DescribeAccessPoints` to get the region ID. The selected access point must exist and be available.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.LineOperator
member.summary: ISP that provides connections. Valid values: ChinaTelecom (China Telecom), ChinaMobile (China Mobile), ChinaUnicom (China Unicom), In-houseWiring (in-house wiring), ChinaOther (other Chinese ISPs), InternationalOperator (international ISPs).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.PortType
member.summary: Port type of connection. Valid values: 100Base-T (100-Megabit electrical Ethernet interface), 1000Base-T (1-Gigabit electrical Ethernet interface), 1000Base-LX (1-Gigabit single-module optical Ethernet interface; 10 KM), 10GBase-T (10-Gigabit electrical Ethernet interface), 10GBase-LR (10-Gigabit single-module optical Ethernet interface; 10 KM). Default value: 1000Base-LX.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.CircuitCode
member.summary: Circuit code of a connection, which is provided by the ISP or connection provider.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.Location
member.summary: Local IDC location.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.Bandwidth
member.summary: Connection port bandwidth in Mbps. Value range: [2,10240]. Default value: 1000.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.RedundantDirectConnectId
member.summary: ID of redundant connection.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.Vlan
member.summary: VLAN for connection debugging, which is enabled and automatically assigned by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.TencentAddress
member.summary: Tencent-side IP address for connection debugging, which is automatically assigned by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.CustomerAddress
member.summary: User-side IP address for connection debugging, which is automatically assigned by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.CustomerName
member.summary: Name of connection applicant, which is obtained from the account system by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.CustomerContactMail
member.summary: Email address of connection applicant, which is obtained from the account system by default.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectRequest.CustomerContactNumber
member.summary: Contact number of connection applicant, which is obtained from the account system by default.

member.summary: Fault reporting contact person.

member.summary: Fault reporting contact number.

member.summary: Dedicated tunnel name.

member.summary: Connection owner, who is the current customer by default. The developer account ID should be entered for shared connections.

member.summary: Network type. Valid values: VPC, BMVPC, CCN. Default value: VPC. VPC: Virtual Private Cloud. BMVPC: BM VPC. CCN: Cloud Connect Network.

member.summary: Network region.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectTunnelRequest.VpcId
member.summary: Unified VPC ID or BMVPC ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectTunnelRequest.DirectConnectGatewayId
member.summary: Direct connect gateway ID, such as `dcg-d545ddf`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectTunnelRequest.Bandwidth
member.summary: Direct Connect bandwidth in Mbps. Default value: connection bandwidth value.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectTunnelRequest.RouteType
member.summary: BGP: BGP routing. STATIC: Static routing. Default value: BGP routing.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.CreateDirectConnectTunnelRequest.BgpPeer

member.summary: Static routing, i.e., IP range of the user's IDC.

member.summary: VLAN. Value range: 0-3,000. 0: sub-interface not enabled. Default value: Non-zero.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DescribeDirectConnectTunnelsRequest.Filters
member.summary:
Filter conditions: This parameter does not support specifying `DirectConnectTunnelIds` and `Filters` at the same time.
direct-connect-tunnel-name: Dedicated tunnel name.
direct-connect-tunnel-id: Dedicated tunnel instance ID, such as `dcx-abcdefgh`.
direct-connect-id: Connection instance ID, such as `dc-abcdefgh`.

member.summary: Connection status. PENDING: Applying. REJECTED: Application rejected. TOPAY: Payment pending. PAID: Paid. ALLOCATED: Constructing. AVAILABLE: Available. DELETING: Deleting. DELETED: Deleted.

member.summary: Connection creation time.

member.summary: Connection activation time.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DirectConnect.LineOperator
member.summary: ISP that provides connections. Valid values: ChinaTelecom (China Telecom), ChinaMobile (China Mobile), ChinaUnicom (China Unicom), In-houseWiring (in-house wiring), ChinaOther (other Chinese ISPs), InternationalOperator (international ISPs).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DirectConnect.Location
member.summary: Location of a local IDC.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DirectConnect.Bandwidth
member.summary: Connection port bandwidth in Mbps.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DirectConnect.PortType
member.summary: User-side port type of a connection. Valid values: 100Base-T (100-Megabit electrical Ethernet interface), 1000Base-T (1-Gigabit electrical Ethernet interface; it is the default value), 1000Base-LX (1-Gigabit single-mode optical Ethernet interface; 10 KM), 10GBase-T (10-Gigabit electrical Ethernet interface), 10GBase-LR (10-Gigabit single-mode optical Ethernet interface; 10 KM).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Dc.V20180410.Models.DirectConnect.CircuitCode
member.summary: Circuit code of a connection, which is provided by the ISP or service provider. Note: this field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
